page.title: 16Boblow House.
page.content: {Boblow house}is about 460 years old.There is a pond with a rowing boat on it.The pond used to go out into the field in a triangle and they used to keep the livestock in it.There are three chimneys at one end and two at the other. The centre one of the three was put on for decoration.In the chimneys there are windows and surprisingly there are rooms behind them. Inside at each end of the house, there's a fireplace.In the middle there's a fireplace for cooking ,which is about 3 metres wide.In one of the bedrooms there's a cupboard with a smaller cupboard in it. There are three theories about the small cupboard, 1. They used to keep their {wigs}in it 2.They used to keep{salt}in it 3. It was{a priest hole,}and the cupboard was for the bread and wine. The house was once a hunting lodge.
